mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM RNO, RID, M.NICKNAME, RCONTENT, TO_CHAR(RDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') RDATE, RLIKE, ROUND(RSTAR, 0) RSTAR FROM (SELECT * FROM PCP_REVIEW R, PCP_HOSPITAL H WHERE R.HID = H.HID AND H.HID=? ORDER BY R.RDATE) T, PCP_MEMBER M WHERE T.MID = M.MID

select rownum rno, rid, rcontent, to_char(rdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') rdate, rlike, rstar, rstate, mid, hid, hname, animal, gloc, nickname from (select r.rid, r.rcontent, r.rdate, r.rlike, r.rstar, r.rstate, r.mid, r.hid, h.hname, h.animal, h.gloc, m.nickname from pcp_review r, pcp_hospital h, pcp_member m where r.hid=h.hid and r.mid = m.mid order by r.rdate desc)

select rno, rid, rcontent, rdate, rlike, rstar, rstate, mid, hid, hname, animal, gloc, nickname from (select rownum rno, rid, rcontent, to_char(rdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') rdate, rlike, rstar, rstate, mid, hid, hname, animal, gloc, nickname from (select r.rid, r.rcontent, r.rdate, r.rlike, r.rstar, r.rstate, r.mid, r.hid, h.hname, h.animal, h.gloc, m.nickname from pcp_review r, pcp_hospital h, pcp_member m where r.hid=h.hid and r.mid = m.mid order by r.rdate desc)) where rno between #{start} and #{end}

select rno, rid, rcontent, rdate, rlike, rstar, rstate, mid, hid, hname, animal, gloc, nickname from (select rownum rno, rid, rcontent, to_char(rdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') rdate, rlike, rstar, rstate, mid, hid, hname, animal, gloc, nickname from (select r.rid, r.rcontent, r.rdate, r.rlike, r.rstar, r.rstate, r.mid, r.hid, h.hname, h.animal, h.gloc, m.nickname from pcp_review r, pcp_hospital h, pcp_member m where r.hid=h.hid and r.mid = m.mid order by r.rdate desc) where gloc = #{gloc}) where rno between #{start} and #{end}

select count(*) from (select rownum rno, rid, rcontent, to_char(rdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') rdate, rlike, rstar, rstate, mid, hid, hname, animal, gloc, nickname from (select r.rid, r.rcontent, r.rdate, r.rlike, r.rstar, r.rstate, r.mid, r.hid, h.hname, h.animal, h.gloc, m.nickname from pcp_review r, pcp_hospital h, pcp_member m where r.hid=h.hid and r.mid = m.mid order by r.rdate desc) where gloc = #{gloc})
mapper.insert: insert into pcp_review(rid, rcontent, rdate, rlike, rstar, rstate, mid, hid,bid ) values('R_'||ltrim(to_char(sequ_pcp_review_rid.nextval,'0000')),#{rcontent},sysdate,0,#{rstar},'X',#{mid},#{hid},#{bid})
mapper.update: update pcp_review set rcontent=#{rcontent}, rstar=#{rstar} where rid=#{rid}
update pcp_review set rstate='O' where rid=#{rid}
mapper.select: select rno,rid,hid,rcontent,hname,gloc,rdate,rlike,rstar,mid, nickname from(select rownum rno,rid,hid,rcontent,hname,gloc,rdate,rlike,rstar,mid,nickname from(select r.rid,r.hid,r.rcontent,h.hname,h.gloc,to_char(r.rdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') rdate,r.rlike,r.rstar,r.mid,m.nickname from pcp_review r, pcp_hospital h, pcp_member m where r.hid=h.hid and r.mid = m.mid order by rlike desc)) where rno between #{start} and #{end}

select h.hname, m.nickname, h.tel, h.gloc, r.rcontent, rid, r.bid, h.img from pcp_review r, pcp_member m, pcp_hospital h, pcp_booking b where r.mid = m.mid and h.hid = r.hid and b.bid = r.bid and r.mid = #{mid}
select count(*) from pcp_review where rid = #{rid} and rstate = 'O'
